t: r/NoStupidQuestions on Reddit: Why does Amazon sell unknown (probably not real) brands of basic stuff that cost an absolute fortune?
Amazon's 70 secret brands: Your definitive shopping guide
s: Men’s shoe brand Franklin & Freeman makes stylish kicks at affordable prices. ... Fans of Prime Pantry and AmazonFresh have likely seen food company Happy Belly's nuts and spices come across their screen.

t: How to check a product on Amazon if it’s brand or not - Quora
s: Answer: Somewhere in the Amazon descriptions is a section that lists all the vital information about the product. If you don’t find the manufacturer named in the details, you know it is off-label. In this example, the manufacturer name (BOSE) is prominent in the title.

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to unlock tools designed to protect and build your brand, creating a better experience for your Amazon customers.

t: What's a relatively unknown brand that provides quality products at a reasonable price that more people should know about/support? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): Generally speaking, numerous of the “store” brands are good quality and price. I found them to taste as good as the more expensive brands.

t: r/amazon on Reddit: Why does Amazon allow identical products with different brand names?
Amazon Private Label Brands - Marketplace Pulse
s: March 18, 2019 - According to Marketplace Pulse research, Amazon-owned private label brands are not nearly as successful as many paint them to be. Amazon has been successful in creating generic items at low prices, but only when using the Amazon brand name (i.e., AmazonBasics and Amazon Essentials).

t: Why does Amazon carry a lot of brands that I have never heard of? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 6): A lot of entrepreneurs and new product ideas (or modified ones) are sold on Amazon. It is a great way to get your product in front of millions of eyes. Also, as others have said, a lot of the gadget-type products are from China…..and have all sorts of strange brand names.
